name: Plume Whip
description:
Description 

This game was made for the ScoreSpace10 game jam. This game fits the theme Direction because your goal is to move in one direction, up. Travel as far up as you can in 100 seconds. Dodge the walls and collect extra lives. Whip rocket's tail around to destroy explosives in your way. Most importantly, remember to have fun!

Controls

  • W / Up Arrow      --> Fire Rocket
  • A / Left Arrow      --> Turn Left
  • D / Right Arrow  --> Turn Right

Attribution

Rocket engine sound mixed from dobroride's sounds found here and here.

All other sound were made with Bfrx found here.
